<size=72>THE PYRAMID</size>

             <size=45>Clear all of the <color=#ffc600>Pyramid cards</c>
          by pairing cards that add up to <color=#ffc600>13</c>.









                        <size=68><color=#ffc600>Valid Pairs

             Q+A        9+4
              J+2         8+5
           10+3         7+6
</c></size>
<color=#ffc600>          K</c> can be cleared without pairing.</size>

<size=72>FREE CELL</size>

<size=45>The <color=#ffc600>Free Cell</size> can store<color=#ffc600> 1</c> card from
the Pyramid or Waste pile.
















Cards in the Free Cell can be used to 
make pairs with cards from the 
Waste pile and the Pyramid.</size>

<size=72>DRAW</size> 

<size=45><color=#ffc600>Tap the Draw pile</c> to move cards
to the Waste pile.

















Make pairs that add up to <color=#ffc600>13</c> with cards
from the <color=#ffc600>Waste pile</c> and the <color=#ffc600>Pyramid</c>.</size>

<size=72>TIME IS KEY</size>

<size=40>There's a <color=#ffc600>${##}</c>-minute limit per game.
You get bonus points for an early finish.

















The fewer cards you leave in the Pyramid,
the bigger time bonus you will get.</size>

<size=72>ABOUT END</size>


<size=45><color=#ffc600>NOT all decks can be solved!</c>

        












If you can't find any more moves,
<color=#ffc600>Pause</c> and <color=#ffc600>End Now</c> before time's up 
to get more time bonus and 
boost your score.



<size=72><color=#ffc600>GOOD LUCK!</c></size></size>

<size=72>ABOUT SCORING</size>

<size=40><color=#ffc600>K from Pyramid</c>
or
<color=#ffc600>2 Pyramid cards </c> +150

<color=#ffc600>1 Pyramid card & 1 Free Cell card</c> +100 

<color=#ffc600>1 Pyramid card & 1 Waste Pile card</c> +100 

<color=#ffc600>K from Free Cell/Waste Pile</c>
or
<color=#ffc600>1 Free Cell card & 1 Waste Pile card</c>
+50

Redrawing from the Waste Pile 
will cost<color=#fe4646> ${##}</c> points each time.

Once you complete the game, 
submit quickly to earn extra time bonus.
